legalEntityID.label: Legal Entity Identifier
legalEntityID.description: Assigned by your federal regulatory agency. Format is right-justified and zero filled.

timestamp.label: Timestamp
timestamp.description: Format is century, year, month, day, hour, minute (e.g., Jan. 17, 2013, at 1:30 pm would be 201301171330)

totalLineEntries.label: Total Line Entries
totalLineEntries.description: The N of line entries contained in the accompanying Loan/Application Register

parentZip.label: Parent Zip Code
parentZip.description: If applicable; format is 99999 left-justified or 999999999

contactName.label: Contact Person's Name
contactName.description: For questionable data, reports, or other issues that may arise during an annual processing cycle.

respondentEmail.label: Contact Person's E-mail Address
respondentEmail.description: Enter only one e-mail address. E-mail address must contain only one @ symbol. Format is left-justified.

legalEntityID.label: Legal Entity Identifier
legalEntityID.description: Assigned by your federal regulatory agency. Format is right-justified and zero-filled.

universalLoanID.label: Universal Loan Identifier
universalLoanID.description: Unique identifier across the home office and branch sites

applicationReceivedDate.label: Date Application Received
applicationReceivedDate.description: Format is yyyymmdd or NA left-justified

values.1: Conventional (any loan other than FHA, VA, FSA, or RHS loans)
values.4: FSA/RHS (Farm Service Agency or Rural Housing Service)

loanAmount.label: Loan Amount
loanAmount.description: Report in dollars with leading zeros and without commas

values.7: Preapproval request denied by financial institution
values.8: Preapproval request approved but not accepted (optional reporting)

propertyZip.label: Property Zip Code
propertyZip.description: Format is 99999 or NA left-justified or Code 999999999

metroArea.label: Metropolitan Statistical Area/Metropolitan Division
metroArea.description: Metropolitan Statistical Area or Metropolitan Division (if appropriate) code or NA left-justified

stateCode.label: State Code
stateCode.description: Two letter state code or NA left-justified

fipsCounty.label: County Code
fipsCounty.description: FIPS code with leading zeros or NA left-justified

censusTract.label: Census Tract
censusTract.description: Include decimal point and any leading or trailing zeros or NA left-justified

values.3: Information not provided by applicant in mail, Internet, or telephone application
Information not provided by applicant in mail, Internet, or telephone application

values.4: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander
values.6: Information not provided by applicant in mail, Internet, or telephone application

values.4: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander
Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander
Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

values.4: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander
Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander
Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander
Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

values.3: Information not provided by applicant in mail, Internet, or telephone application
Information not provided by applicant in mail, Internet, or telephone application

applicantIncome.label: Applicant Income
applicantIncome.description: Report in thousands, round to the nearest thousand with leading zeros and without commas or NA left-justified

values.0: Loan was not originated or was not sold in calendar year covered by register
values.6: Commercial bank, savings bank or savings association
values.7: Life insurance company, credit union, mortgage bank, or finance company

rateSpread.label: Rate Spread
rateSpread.description: Enter the rate spread to three decimal places. Include the decimal point and any leading or trailing zeros or NA left-justified

values.2: HOEPA loan because of points and fees
values.3: HOEPA loan because of both APR and points and fees

coapplicantCreditScore.label: Co-applicant Credit Score
coapplicantCreditScore.description: Three digit credit score or NA left-justified

applicantCreditModel.label: Applicant Credit Model
applicantCreditModel.description: Credit score model used to calculate the applicant's credit score

values.7: More than one credit scoring model

applicantCreditModelText.label: Applicant Credit Model Text
applicantCreditModelText.description: Applicant credit model text for credit model of other

coapplicantCreditModel.label: Co-applicant Credit Model
coapplicantCreditModel.description: Credit score model used to calculate the co-applicant's credit score or NA left-justified

values.7: More than one credit scoring model

coapplicantCreditModelText.label: Coapplicant Credit Model Text
coapplicantCreditModelText.description: Coapplicant credit model text for credit model of other

totalFees.label: Total Points and Fees
totalFees.description: Total sum of all points and fees in dollars rounded to the nearest whole dollar amount or NA left-justified

totalOriginationCharges.label: Total Origination Charges
totalOriginationCharges.description: Total sum of all origination charges in dollars rounded to the nearest whole dollar amount or NA left-justified

totalDiscountPoints.label: Total Discount Points
totalDiscountPoints.description: Total sum of all discount points in dollars rounded to the nearest whole dollar amount or NA left-justified

riskAdjustedInterestRate.label: Risk-Adjusted Pre-Discounted Interest Rate
riskAdjustedInterestRate.description: Enter the interest rate to three decimal places. Include the decimal point and any leading or trailing zeros or NA left-justified

interestRate.label: Interest Rate
interestRate.description: Enter the interest rate to three decimal places. Include the decimal point and any leading or trailing zeros or NA left-justified

prepaymentPenaltyTerm.label: Prepayment Penalty Term
prepaymentPenaltyTerm.description: Term in months of any prepayment penalty applicable to the covered loan or application or NA left-justified

dtiRatio.label: Debt-to-Income Ratio
dtiRatio.description: Enter the applicant's debt-to-income ratio to two decimal places. Include the decimal point and any leading or trailing zeros or NA left-justified

cltvRatio.label: Combined Loan-to-Value Ratio
cltvRatio.description: Enter the applicant's combined loan-to-value ratio to two decimal places. Include the decimal point and any leading or trailing zeros or NA left-justified

loanTerm.label: Loan Term
loanTerm.description: Loan term in months or NA left-justified

introductoryRatePeriod.label: Introductory Rate Period
introductoryRatePeriod.description: Number of months from loan origination until interest rate may change

balloonPayment.label: Balloon Payment
balloonPayment.description: Indicate if the loan requires a payment that is more than two times a regular periodic payment

interestOnlyPayments.label: Interest Only Payments
interestOnlyPayments.description: Indicate if the loan would permit one or more periodic payments to be applied solely to accrued interest and not to principal

negativeAmortization.label: Negative Amortization
negativeAmortization.description: Indicate if the loan would permit a minimum periodic payment that covers only a portion of the accrued interest

otherNonAmortizingFeatures.label: Other Non-Amortizing Features
otherNonAmortizingFeatures.description: Indicate if the loan includes terms that would allow for payments other than fully amortizing payments

propertyValue.label: Property Value
propertyValue.description: Property value in dollars or NA left-justified

mhLegalClassification.label: Manufactured Home Legal Classification
mhLegalClassification.description: Indicate whether the manufactured home related to loan is legally classified as real property or as personal property

mhLandPropertyInterest.label: Manufactured Home Land Property Interest
mhLandPropertyInterest.description: Indicate whether the borrower owns the land on which a manufactured home is located through a direct or indirect ownership interest or leases the land through a paid or unpaid leasehold

totalUnits.label: Total Units
totalUnits.description: Total number of units on the property

multifamilyUnits.label: Multifamily Affordable Units
multifamilyUnits.description: Total number of multifamily units on the property or NA left-justified

applicationChannel.label: Application Channel
applicationChannel.description: Indicate whether the applicant submitted the application directly to your institution

initiallyPayable.label: Initially Payable
initiallyPayable.description: Indicate whether the covered loan was or would have been initially payable to your institution

nmlsrID.label: Nationwide Mortgage Licensing System and Registry Identifier
nmlsrID.description: Mortgage loan originator identifier or NA left-justified

aus.label: Automated Underwriting System
aus.description: Name of the automated underwriting system used by your institution

values.3: Technology open to approved lenders (TOTAL) scorecard

ausText.label: Automated Underwriting System Text Field
ausText.description: Name of the automated underwriting system used by your institution when other is supplied

ausRecommendation.label: Automated Underwriting System Recommendation
ausRecommendation.description: Recommendation generated by your institution's AUS

ausRecommendationText.label: Automated Underwriting System Recommendation Text Field
ausRecommendationText.description: Automated underwriting system recommendation text when other is supplied

reverseMortgage.label: Reverse Mortgage Flag
reverseMortgage.description: Indicate whether the loan is a reverse mortgage

heloc.label: HELOC Flag
heloc.description: Indicate whether the loan is a home equity line of credit

qualifiedMortgageID.label: Qualified Mortgage Indentifier
qualifiedMortgageID.description: Indicate whether the loan is a qualified mortgage

firstDraw.label: HELOC and Open-End Reverse Mortgage First Draw
firstDraw.description: HELOC and open-end reverse mortgage first draw in dollars
